location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Major William Cowper, Commissary General at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter confirms a shipment of forty horses for the 17th regiment is on the baghla [buggalow] Nausarieunder the command of Cojea Matook. The letter also states the baghla will be sailing in the company of the Fathalvadoodand a batille. Also included is a bill for 4000 rupees dated 27 February 1815.
